item.title: IDEA Vim
item.description: I’ve been using the IDEA Vim plugin in Android Studio for a while. I only ever learned the basics with Practical Vim, but that’s been enough. The nice part is how the same muscle memory works everywhere: I can edit the same way in Android Studio, VS Code, iTerm, or Obsidian. Most editor-specific shortcuts I used to know are gone, and I don’t miss them. IDEA Vim config Here’s my .
